data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on Cryptamorpha sculptifrons Reitter (Coleoptera, Silvanidae), with description of its larval morphology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshida, Takahiro, Hirowatari, Toshiya (2014): Taxonomic notes on Cryptamorpha sculptifrons Reitter (Coleoptera, Silvanidae), with description of its larval morphology. ZooKeys 412: 117-129, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.412.7615, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.412.7615
